normalized: --a dry breeze jolted my hair.
i remember this scene.
this time, i immediately realized i was in a dream.

name: asagi
normalized: （this dream again….
it was a savage spectacle, but i wasn't fearful.
instead, it was reality in a bad dream.

name: asagi
normalized: （at any rate, why am i in such a place….
my consciousness was stable and steady enough that it didn't appear to be a dream.
it was truly a mysterious place.
i had never experienced a dream like this, and yet, it was very…, very nostalgic.
despite the scenery being desolate like this, for some reason it made me feel at ease.

name: asagi
normalized: （but, the demon corpses….
, this place should be hell, and yet, why do i…）
incidentally as feelings of doubt crossed my mind….

name: shadow
normalized: you really look shit, huh
looking over my shoulder at that voice, i saw a familiar woman dressed in a ninja outfit standing there.
she resembled me, but she wasn't me.

name: shadow
normalized: you look fucking pathetic.
and yet, you're the woman who is called the strongest taimanin?

name: asagi
normalized: you, who are you!?

name: shadow
normalized: who am i?
we should have already met a while ago….
you still don't recognize me?

name: asagi
normalized: don't screw with me!
she shrugged at me taking a defensive posture.

name: shadow
normalized: it appears that you truly don't recognize me, huh

name: asagi
normalized: recognize?

name: shadow
normalized: i am you

name: asagi
normalized: wha?

name: shadow
normalized: i said i am you

name: asagi
normalized: i don't know what you mean!
why am i being showed an illusion!?

name: shadow
normalized: i'm not an illusion….
i am really here

name: asagi
normalized: are you something oboro schemed up!?

name: shadow
normalized: that's not it….
, you really are fucked up, aren't you.
you're not able to comprehend why?

name: asagi
normalized: what!
a bitter smile formed on her mouth.

name: shadow
normalized: it's no use.
it's going to take a few drastic measures, but--
the acute angle of her fingertips aimed at my throat with lightning fast ferocity.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu--
i drew my sword just in time as the palm of her hands clashed into it.
her speed was on par with mine--, our lightning fast movements collided into one another and we jostled for control.

name: asagi
normalized: you!

name: shadow
normalized: fufufu….
, even though you look dispirited, your body hasn't yet forgotten how to fight it seems….

name: asagi
normalized: how are you imitating me!

name: shadow
normalized: you're better off dead if you cannot stop this much of a blow…

name: asagi
normalized: what!

name: shadow
normalized: dying here, maybe you'd be happy wandering around inside of a dream for eternity?
even though she had shown violent emotions, she was smiling with composure.

name: shadow
normalized: well?
even though it's come to this, do you still not understand?

name: asagi
normalized: what was it you were saying before!?

name: shadow
normalized: i said i was you….
, are you that fearful of me?

name: asagi
normalized: you're the one creeping in as you please into someone's dream, what are you talking about!?

name: shadow
normalized: what is it you cannot comprehend?

name: asagi
normalized: damn it, identify yourself!
her fingertips and my sword continued to lock as we exchanged words with one another.

name: shadow
normalized: …i'm not going to explain every detail that you don't understand

name: asagi
normalized: what?

name: shadow
normalized: sex demons are encroaching into my…your soul

name: asagi
normalized: …sex demon?

normalized: that's right, sex demons.
in other words, they are trying to eat you from the inside out

name: shadow
normalized: accept who i am.
by doing this you…

name: asagi
normalized: shut up!
i used my sword to repel her sharp talons, springing backwards for the sake of readjusting my posture.
with space now between us, i measured up my opponent and readied myself.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu…
she had been terribly thirsty for my throat.
it had still only been one meeting blow, but i understood the threat my opponent posed.

name: asagi
normalized: （this person….
, is really me….
while i gradually comprehended the situation in my head, i also did not want to admit that.

name: shadow
normalized: …somehow, it looks like you get it now, huh
she kept a vigilant eye on me as she showed me her sharp talons.

name: asagi
normalized: shut up…

name: shadow
normalized: are you that afraid of me.
or do you think this body is ugly?

name: asagi
normalized: shut up!
i stepped forward at once.

name: shadow
normalized: fuu….
, has being raped too much driven you to violent emotions!?

name: asagi
normalized: i said shut the fuck up!
i sprung forward with a lightning quick sword attack, but was turned away by her armor-covered talons.

name: shadow
normalized: what's the matter?
is that all you've got?

name: asagi
normalized: chii--
talon and blade repeatedly clashed, raising high-pitched metal shrieks into the air.

name: shadow
normalized: fufufuu…, i did say i was you, didn't i.
did you think i've never seen that sort of swordsmanship before?

name: asagi
normalized: don't laugh at me!
i hurled anger at the person who was turning aside my sword and laughing coolly about it.
the furious sound of my sword colliding on to her talons boomed across the hellish wasteland.

name: asagi
normalized: hah--!
this time, she chose the interval and exchanged attacks with me using her steel-like talons.
it was as if our speed and power were exactly identical.
but, right now i felt as if she were toying with me.

name: asagi
normalized: （i can't win, why….

name: shadow
normalized: that is still to be decided.
there's no way you can hit me by just using your sword, right?

name: asagi
normalized: wha--

name: shadow
normalized: earlier, i told you over and over i was you.
knowing what you're thinking is only natural, right?

name: shadow
normalized: you may have a much larger swing, but i have a much better thirst for death

name: asagi
normalized: kuu…

name: shadow
normalized: even though you were trapped emotionally, that blood that burns when you fight….
a taimanin really has no control over it

name: shadow
normalized: why are you hesitating….
, if it's true, you no longer have any choice
removing her posture as she said that, she shortened the distance between us instantly.
i didn't sense her intent to kill and so i instinctively lowered my blade.

name: asagi
normalized: what….

normalized: don't move….
, i'll end this right now
that hand had brushed my cheek softly.
it was at that moment that her intentions streamed into me.

name: shadow
normalized: don't be afraid….
, fear isn't necessary

name: shadow
normalized: （i sense it….
you are the moment of battle….
, i've forgotten everything, that thrill of the moment of brushing with death…）

name: asagi
normalized: （kuu….

name: asagi
normalized: shut up!

name: shadow
normalized: fufufuu….

name: asagi
normalized: i told you to shut up!

name: shadow
normalized: what's wrong?

my blade's angry bellow ripped through the sky.

name: asagi
normalized: chii--!

i broke out in a cold sweat.

name: asagi
normalized: （i've been beaten… i've been completely beaten…）

name: asagi
normalized: wh, where….

name: shadow
normalized: your strength is purely natural… it's just the way you use it is stained by righteousness….

name: asagi
normalized: show….
, show yourself!

normalized: the weak always lapse into betrayal.

name: shadow

normalized: the strong…
